[Thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=711) weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from [Rage](/Actions.aspx?ID=2802) to your thrown weapon attacks. If you have the [Brutal Critical](/Feats.aspx?ID=174) feat or the [devastator class feature](/Classes.aspx?ID=2), apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.
